channel.title: Def bonuses
channel.description: im using satan's isle source and i already coded alot and put alot fo time into it and ive been wondering how to get def bonuses working. Because 1 atk could hit 100 def like it was nothing. I also want the bonuses to work on npcs.

item.title: Def bonuses
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

… everyone knows how to do that why would i post and ask soemthing stupid like that use your brain. im talking about def BONUSES when 1 atk hits full rune it would hit constant 0s. but in my server it hits at high as the strenght alows without hitting any 0s.

Read full topic

item.title: Def bonuses
item.dc:creator: @monkeykid300 monkeykid300
item.description:
@monkeykid300 wrote:

def bounuses like armor? well if thats what ur talking about go to item.cfg file and open it up with notepad or word or whatever u use. do ctrl+f and it comes up with search. search the item id and there will be a bunch of numbers. change the numbers to whatever u like.

Read full topic
